name: RI_1_1_5_Access_View_Record_Lifecycle_Event
title: RI.1.1.5 Access/View Record Lifecycle Event (Function)
description: Access/View Record Entries (1 or more instances)
purpose:
Occurs when an agent causes the system to obtain and open a record entry for inspection or review. 

Reference: ISO 21089-2018, Section 15.5.

statement.label: RI.1.1.5#01
statement.requirement: The system MAY mask Record Entry content to access by authorized entities.

statement.label: RI.1.1.5#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to render Record Entry content, including original version and any subsequent amendments.

statement.label: RI.1.1.5#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to render Record Entry content down to the discrete element or item, including encoded fields.
